title: Demotion Shield
body: Hi i am sitting at gold 5 -3 lp with a demotion shield, if i dont play any games this season on solo duo que will i get demoted eventually? or will i still get my rewards where i am currently at? Thank you

replies.body: Gold doesn't have decay! You'll be fine without playing any games no matter how long if you stay in Gold or below.
Thank you :) i really want those rewards!
